title: Brief remarks by Governor Powell
content: For release on delivery  8:35 a.m. EDT  April 20, 2017      Remarks by     Jerome H. Powell     Member     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at     The Global Finance Forum     Washington, D.C.                 April 20, 2017
